title: A couple of typefaces
content:
Hi,  
I did a search as I may have seen the first typeface posted on here before,  
but couldn’t seem to find a match? If anyone could help out with find the  
name of these it would be much appreciated. Thanks.

From “Another Magazine”

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080423012514im_/http:/typophile.com/files/mind_breathes_4524.png)

From Kelley Stoltz new album ’Circular Sounds’

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080423012514im_/http:/typophile.com/files/curcular_sounds_6478.png)

 [‹ Label ID - Whole Earth](http://web.archive.org/web/20080423012514/http:/typophile.com/node/41728 "Go to previous forum topic") [New York Giants logo font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080423012514/http:/typophile.com/node/41672 "Go to next forum topic")
author: apparatus™

comments.content: Ahh, thanks I knew I read about this somewhere. Thanks! Any luck on the bottom typeface?
The bottom one looks like Mostra One Light, exept for the (unicase) a and S. Custom work?
Thanks Marten, that is certainly correct. Thanks for your observation.
